@Sgt_Bravo Yup. He didn't litter or anything.
@Sgt_Bravo He once rolled into a venue I was working & when I tried to let him in for free he insisted on paying cover like every1 else.
@Sgt_Bravo Definitely. See him around the city a fair bit. Always nice to every1. He randomly shows to small venues & jams too. Crazy to see
@Sgt_Bravo Somewhere, I have a pic of me with Gordon in front of a produce display at a market. I lived near him for yrs. Legit great guy
@Sgt_Bravo Race Among The Ruins.
@Sgt_Bravo I heard he's doing a big US tour this year. I'll be seeing him in the summer again. Good times.
@Sgt_Bravo Cheers to that.
@Sgt_Bravo Perhaps more protests are in order. https://t.co/m3Zec7HCuz

@BeatoBrandy I know, right? We Canadians look JUST LIKE YOU. We're sneaky like that...

@BeatoBrandy I'm not American, so no. I've only missed 2 elections here since eligible @ 18. My grandparents fought for that right so I vote
@BeatoBrandy Hijackers were from Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt & Lebanon. ALL left off Trump's list. This ban wouldn't have prevented 9/11.
@BeatoBrandy He also didn't include ANY of the countries of the 9/11 hijackers. Countries left off list are all where he has businesses. Hmm
@BeatoBrandy Banning by religion is unconstitutional. If a white Christian woman shot up a mall which of YOUR rights should we take away?
@danconley Don't you DARE take this away from me, Dan.
@TheRickWilson A Senate confirmation would be must see TV. Please let this happen. https://t.co/eKL6lZG2Hf
@BeatoBrandy Excellent point. Many protestors prob didn't bother to vote. A study showed 50% of Tea Party didn't vote in '08. R&D both suck
@pkatjjames @BeatoBrandy The right HATED it when libs said "But Bush" & yet all I hear from the right now is "But Obama". Amazing hypocrisy
@pkatjjames @BeatoBrandy True. The left let Obama off the hook for plenty of things. Now the right is doing the same so they're no better.
@BeatoBrandy His Muslim ban was a major part of his campaign for a year+. I'm curious why you seem surprised by it?
@BeatoBrandy Trump's ban includes green card holders WHO HAVE ALREADY BEEN VETTED and are legal US residents, which is unconstitutional.
@BeatoBrandy Obama's State Dept. stopped processing Iraqi refugees for six months in 2011 in direct response to a failed terror plot in KY.
@JeffreyGoldberg Yup, here comes the pivot. Any day now...
@NaylorLandsberg The have a right to speak out on any issue they feel strongly about, and I have the right to ignore them.
@mollymotoole @POTUS Hold on. Let me put on my surprised face. https://t.co/TP080Qxi73

@tribelaw @roddreher Is this what passes for conservative thought these days? I mean, c'mon man.

@El__Chorro Both he & cops reacted on instinct in the midst of what must've been sheer chaos. Thankfully he wasn't killed in the encounter.
@El__Chorro He said it himself - he looked suspicious running from cops @ the scene of a terrorist attack. (I don't blame him at all, btw.)
